_description: Evaluation test cases for DreamZero-DROID. Sources: DreamZero paper Tables 5-7, evals_gallery, training_data_gallery, yam_gallery.
_note: We are running the DreamZero-DROID checkpoint (Franka single-arm). DROID tasks from Table 7 are directly applicable. AgiBot/YAM tasks test cross-embodiment language generalization.

droid_seen_tasks._description: DROID seen tasks from DreamZero paper Table 7a. Verbs present in DROID training data.

cases.prompt: Move the cup forward then put the marker inside the cup
Put the marker in the blue box
Remove the pair of gloves from the open drawer and put it on the table
Put the marker on table
Pick up the apple and put it in the basket
Put the towel on the white cup
Put the towel in the pan
Put the hat on the table
Put the pair of scissors into the drawer
Put the towel in the basket
Move the bowl on the left to the right side of the table.
Pick up the pencil and put it on the bowl
Pick the marker up from the table and put it in the bowl
Place the bowl next to the marker
Remove a lemon from the bowl
Move the grapes to the left
Move the green grapes backwards
Put the bread inside the toaster
Pack the lever on the bread toaster downwards
Pick up the cup from the bowl and put it in the other cups

droid_unseen_verb_tasks._description: DROID unseen verb tasks from DreamZero paper Table 7b. Verbs NOT in DROID training data. Tests zero-shot generalization.

cases.prompt: Orient the mug so the handle is to the right
Fan the burger
Slice the bread with the knife
Type 'hi' on the keyboard
Extricate the straw from the cup
Reveal the object under the cup
Match the objects to their corresponding bowl
Maneuver the blocks through the matching hole
Affix the magnet to the tray
Combine the nuts and batteries
Shrek the hat onto the tripod
Pinch the binder clip to release the papers
Withdraw the bread from the toaster and place on the plate
Clinch the drawstring of the bag
Dispense the mustard onto the bread
Bake the croissant in the oven
Fry the vegetables in the pan with the spatula
Depress the lever on the toaster
Elevate the yellow block to the highest platform
Weave the wire through the holes of the box

agibot_seen_tasks._description: AgiBot G1 seen tasks from paper Table 5 and evals_gallery. Tests cross-embodiment language conditioning on DROID checkpoint.

cases.prompt: Pick up the fruit on the table and place it in the bowl
Pick up the fruit from the bag and place it into the basket
Use a sponge to wipe the coffee spill off the table
Pick up the fork from the table and place it on the plate
Pick up the pen from the table and place it into the pen holder
Pick up the cup from the table and place it on the coaster
Stack the green bowl on the blue bowl
Fold the shirt
Fold the shorts
Pick up the shirt and place it on the stack of clothes

agibot_unseen_tasks._description: AgiBot G1 unseen tasks from paper Table 6. Verbs absent from AgiBot training data.

cases.prompt: Untie the shoelaces
Remove the hat from the mannequin's head
Pick up the marker and draw a circle on the whiteboard
Pull the straw out of the cup
Stack the red cube on top of the blue cube
Grab the brush and paint on the canvas
Grab the iron and move it across the shirt to iron it
Shake the hand of the human
Fold the map in half
Grab the cart and pull it forward

training_gallery_tasks._description: Tasks from the DreamZero training data gallery. Real training prompts from AgiBot data collection.

cases.prompt: Picks up and wipe the book
Brush sauce onto bread
Pump air into inflatable with hand pump
Pick up sponge and wipe shoe
Scrub toilet with toilet brush
Pick up brush and brush sink
Pick up takeout container and place on table
Wipe table with cleaning cloth
Pass spatula to left arm, readjust grip, and stir fry
Pick up plate from sink and wipe the dishes
Dry paint with hair dryer
Take snack and place into shopping basket
Sort components into corresponding bins
Pack toy into bag
Place cake into microwave and close door
Arrange chairs neatly
Remove coffee cup from machine and pour coffee into another cup
Clean the fruit bin with a brush
Pick up and hang the scarf on the clothes rod
Arrange the shoes on the floor
Clean the TV cabinet with feather duster
Place the tissue into the tissue box
Take out food from the bag and place it on the plate
Dump the food from the plate into the trash can
Sanitize the countertop with the disinfectant
Assemble a sandwich
Place food in ziploc bag
Place the card into the wallet
Hang the umbrella onto the coat rack
Flip over picture frame and place on TV stand
Pick up plate and place in cabinet
Replace coffee filter bag
Put food inside the oven
Open the rice cooker and place the bowl in
Put wallet into purse
Place sandwich on counter
Put sandwich into microwave
Open fridge and take plate
Spread jam onto the bread
Make a sandwich
Turn off the lamp
Scoop the oatmeal into the bowl
Place the plate into the dishwasher
Open the bottle with bottle opener
Place flower into vase
Water potted plant with watering can
Sweep trash into dust pan and throw it away
Stack the plates in the sink
Hang the shirt on the rack
Fold the napkin
Close the toilet lid

yam_gallery_tasks._description: Tasks from the YAM robot gallery. 30-min play data for few-shot embodiment adaptation.

cases.prompt: Pick up the pipe and insert it into the slot.
Pick up the black cube and place it on the red halo pad.
With both grippers fold the towel from bottom to top, then with the left gripper fold the towel from left to right.
Fold the t-shirt.
Pick up the black bar and place it on the red horizontal pad.
Hand off the cube from left to right hand and place it on the red pad.
Move the green bar to rack
Stack the bowls in consecutive sizes on top of the largest bowl.
Take the dishes out of the basket and place them in the dish rack.
Put the mail into its corresponding mailbox.
Place the candy into the box and close it, then place the box into the tray matching the candy's color.

agibot_posttraining_tasks._description: Post-training evaluation tasks from paper Section 4.2. Used to measure fine-tuning performance.

cases.prompt: Fold the flattened t-shirt through 5 sequential stages
Pack 10 fruits from the table into the bag
Clear 5 pieces of trash into the trash bin and 5 pieces of dishware into the dish bin
